mapper.insert: insert into sys_student (student_id, school_id, student_name, student_number, email, birthday, phone_number, sex, avatar, `password`, `status`, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{schoolId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select student_id, school_id, student_name, student_number, email, birthday, phone_number, sex, avatar, `password`, `status`, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_student where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select student_id, school_id, student_name, student_number, email, birthday, phone_number, sex, avatar, `password`, `status`, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_student where student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select student_id, school_id, student_name, student_number, email, birthday, phone_number, sex, avatar, `password`, `status`, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_student where school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and student_number = #{studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select student_id, school_id, student_name, student_number, email, birthday, phone_number, sex, avatar, `password`, `status`, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_student where phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select student_id, school_id, student_name, student_number, email, birthday, phone_number, sex, avatar, `password`, `status`, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_student
